channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Coca-Cola says it will use U.S. cane sugar in a new Coke, a plan pushed by Trump
item.description: Coca-Cola's move comes a week after President Trump said he had been talking to the soft drink giant about using cane sugar rather than high-fructose ...

item.title: 2 military bases expand to detain immigrants. And, Israel advances into central Gaza
item.description: Two U.S. military bases are expanding to detain immigrants suspected of being in the country without legal status. And, Israel has advanced into Centr...

item.title: Have all girls or all boys? Study suggests the odds aren't 50/50
item.description: A study analyzed decades of births and found that larger families showed a distinct tendency toward all girls or all boys, rather than a mix.

item.title: Hurry up! Scientists predict today will be (slightly) shorter than normal
item.description: Earth doesn't rotate exactly on schedule. Scientists believe that today is going to be about a millisecond short of a typical 24-hour day.

item.title: NPR news chief announces she's leaving days after Congress kills federal funding
item.description: NPR newsroom chief Edith Chapin says she's leaving the network. She made the announcement just days after Congress voted to strip public broadcasting ...

item.title: Google, Microsoft say Chinese hackers are exploiting SharePoint zero-day

item.title: Things to know about the release of federal documents related to MLK’s assassination
item.description: Federal records related to the investigation into the assassination of the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. have been released.

item.title: User privacy app Cloaked adds AI-powered caller screening
item.description: Cloaked is releasing a new call guard feature to let an AI-powered bot chat to scammers on a user's behalf.
